data.title: Attorney Cole White
data.meta_description: When Cole had his accident, nothing could be done to help him financially to recover from his injuries. He doesn’t want anyone to experience the same heartache he faced after his own traumatic injury.
data.text:
John A. Marvin is an attorney with Pipas Law P.A. based out of St. Petersburg, Florida. Prior to joining Pipas Law, Mr. Marvin had an extensive background assisting hundreds of personal injury and first party insurance clients. He has an abundance of experience handling motor vehicle accidents, commercial accidents, trucking accidents, premises liability, wrongful death, and property insurance. Mr. Marvin has litigated complex cases throughout the state courts of Florida and in Federal Court.

Prior to practicing law, Mr. Marvin received his Bachelor of Science from Florida State University. He then went on to obtain his Juris Doctorate from Stetson University College of Law in 2021.

In his free time, Mr. Marvin enjoys hanging out with his fiancé and their dog Maci. When he isn’t spending time with his family, Mr. Marvin enjoys fishing, golfing and traveling.

“This is the lesson: never give in, never give in, never, never, never, never—in nothing, great or small, large or petty—never give in except to convictions of honor and good sense. Never yield to force; never yield to the apparently overwhelming might of the enemy.” – Winston Churchill
